name: The Zombie Problem 3 (Singleplayer FPS Campaign)
description:
The Zombie problem 3 is a FPS zombie story campaign that where you will go through 7 different levels. Find more guns stay alive and make it to the end is the goal.

Backstory: You are ben who has just woke up in a town that he has never seen before and the world around him has fallen into chaos. Your objective now is to just survive!

Known bugs

- Loading screen take a long time

-game tends to crash sometimes so save frequently

-The 3rd level seems to have a lot of performance issues

Check out my youtube channel that is where I put most of my efforts:

Here is MY channel link:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpdrVlgUrVEjpjLC6b_bN1Q
